        public long insertHabit(Habit habit,

        This method is used to insert the habit to the habit column in the SQLiteDatabase.
        Parameters:
        habit - This parameter is to get the habit object.
        UID - This parameter is the get the UID to refer which habit column is going to be inserted.
        Returns:
